TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FontDialog extends System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.DefaultEvent("Apply")
System.ComponentModel.DefaultProperty("Font")

summary.span: 提示用户从本地计算机上安装的字体中选择一种字体。

span.span: Prompts the user to choose a font from among those installed on the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须调用继承成员 才能创建此特定的通用对话框。The inherited member must be invoked to create this specific common dialog box. 可以重写 以实现特定的对话框挂钩功能。 can be overridden to implement specific dialog box hook functionality. 在创建 的实例时，某些读/写属性将设置为初始值。When you create an instance of , some of the read/write properties are set to initial values. 有关这些值的列表，请参阅 构造函数。For a list of these values, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 显示 。The following code example uses to display a . 此代码要求 已创建，并在其上放置了 和按钮。This code requires that a has already been created with a and button placed on it. 还要求已创建 `fontDialog1`。It also requires that the `fontDialog1` has been created. 包含大小信息，但不包含颜色信息。The contains the size information but not the color information. [!code-cpp[Classic FontDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic FontDialog Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic FontDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic FontDialog Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic FontDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic FontDialog Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 的实例时，将初始化以下读/写属性。When you create an instance of , the following read/write properties are initialized. |属性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`true`| ||`true`| ||`true`| ||`true`| ||`Color.Black`| ||`false`| ||00| ||00| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`true`| ||`false`| 可以通过单独调用属性来更改任何这些属性的值。You can change the value for any of these properties through a separate call to the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks "**字体**" 对话框中的 "**脚本**" 组合框包含与所选字体关联的字符集。The **Script** combo box found on the **Font** dialog box contains character sets associated with the selected font.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Apply As EventHandler

summary.span: 当用户单击字体对话框中的“应用”按钮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user clicks the **Apply** button in the font dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次单击 "**应用**" 按钮时，都会引发另一个 事件。Every time the **Apply** button is clicked, another event is raised. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 、、 和 成员以及如何处理 事件。The following code example demonstrates using the , , and members and handling the event. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为 `FontDialog1` 的 的窗体中，并将一个名为 `Button1`的 。To run this example paste the following code in a form containing a named `FontDialog1` and a named `Button1`. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.FontDialogMustExist#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FontDialogMustExist/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FontDialogMustExist#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FontDialogMustExist/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FontDialogMustExist#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FontDialogMustExist/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected override IntPtr HookProc (IntPtr hWnd, int msg, IntPtr wparam, IntPtr lparam);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance native int HookProc(native int hWnd, int32 msg, native int wparam, native int lparam) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function HookProc (hWnd As IntPtr, msg As Integer, wparam As IntPtr, lparam As IntPtr) As IntPtr
protected: override IntPtr HookProc(IntPtr hWnd, int msg, IntPtr wparam, IntPtr lparam);
override this.HookProc : nativeint * int * nativeint * nativeint -> nativeint

span.span: The handle to the dialog box window.
The message being received.
Additional information about the message.
Additional information about the message.

summary.span: 指定为将特定功能添加到通用对话框而重写的通用对话框挂钩程序。

span.span: Specifies the common dialog box hook procedure that is overridden to add specific functionality to a common dialog box.

returns.span: 如果默认对话框过程处理此消息，则为零值；如果默认对话框过程忽略此消息，则为非零值。

span.span: A zero value if the default dialog box procedure processes the message; a nonzero value if the default dialog box procedure ignores the message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 挂钩过程是一种机制，通过该机制，函数可在事件到达应用程序之前截获这些事件。A hook procedure is a mechanism by which a function can intercept events before they reach an application. 当你覆盖 类的 方法时，操作系统将调用函数的重写，以将操作系统消息发布到该窗口。When you override the method for a class, the operating system invokes your override of the function to post operating system messages to the window. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method. 该示例包含继承 类的类。The example consists of a class that inherits the class. 在类的 重写中，该示例根据特定窗口消息的常量值计算方法的 `msg` 参数。In the class's override, the example evaluates the method's `msg` parameter against constant values for particular Windows messages. 如果 `msg` 参数等于指定的常量，则该示例将编写跟踪输出，用于标识传递到 方法的 Windows 消息。If the `msg` parameter equals the specified constant, the example writes trace output identifying the Windows message that was passed to the method. 此示例要求声明 方法的类继承 类。This example requires that the class in which the method is declared inherits the class. [!code-cpp[HookProc Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/HookProc Example/CPP/fontdialogoverride.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[HookProc Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/HookProc Example/CS/fontdialogoverride.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HookProc Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/HookProc Example/VB/fontdialogoverride.vb#1)]

para.span: 当在派生类中重写 时，请确保调用基类的 方法。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method.

summary.span: 获取或设置用户可选择的最大磅值。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum point size a user can select.

value.span: 用户可选择的最大磅值。

span.span: The maximum point size a user can select.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为了使最大和最小大小设置生效， 必须大于 并且两者都必须大于0。In order for the maximum and minimum size settings to take effect, must be greater than , and both must be greater than 0. 尝试将此属性设置为小于0的值将导致使用值0。Attempts to set this property to values less than 0 will result in a value of 0 being used. 如果将 设置为小于 的值，则 设置为 。If you set to a value less than , is set to . 将 和 设置为相同的值的效果是将所选内容限制为单个字体大小。The effect of setting and to the same values is to limit the size selection to a single font size. 当点大小为0时，没有字体大小限制。When the point size is 0, there are no font size limits. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 、、 和 成员以及如何处理 事件。The following code example demonstrates using the , , and members and handling the event. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为 `FontDialog1` 的 的窗体中，并将一个名为 `Button1`的 。To run this example paste the following code in a form containing a named `FontDialog1` and a named `Button1`. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.FontDialogMustExist#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FontDialogMustExist/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FontDialogMustExist#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FontDialogMustExist/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FontDialogMustExist#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FontDialogMustExist/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关概述，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For an overview, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).

summary.span: 将所有对话框选项重置为默认值。

span.span: Resets all dialog box options to their default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重置选项后，会启用删除线、下划线和颜色效果。When the options are reset, the strikethrough, underline, and color effects are enabled. 列出的字体只包含系统支持的屏幕字体。The fonts listed include only the screen fonts supported by the system.
